_meta.note: Reference competitor profile for Konscious House of Brands. Not a direct competitor but a DTC supplement playbook reference.

company_profile.background: DTC supplement house of brands model, multiple health products under one umbrella
company_profile.brands: Multiple health/wellness brands under Konscious umbrella

flagship_product.name: Emma Relief
flagship_product.note: Digestive health supplement, strong VSL funnel

tech_stack.details: Standard Shopify DTC stack with subscription management

amazon_presence.note: Uses separate brand name on Amazon marketplace

authority_figure.name: Dr. Gina Sam
authority_figure.role: Medical authority / spokesperson for Emma Relief
authority_figure.note: Gastroenterologist lending credibility to digestive health claims

company_profile.pricing_tiers: Multiple price points with bundle discounts to drive higher AOV

controversy.details: Better Business Bureau F rating - indicates customer service or complaint issues
controversy.relevance: Shows that aggressive DTC tactics can generate revenue but create trust problems

data.why_this_matters: Konscious is not a direct competitor but represents a proven DTC supplement playbook: authority figure + VSL funnel + aggressive Meta ads + subscription + high AOV through bundles. Their successes (650K customers, $126 AOV) and failures (BBB F rating) are both instructive for IonWave's go-to-market strategy.
